channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description:
@EladNehorai I mean, it’s not like the guy who repped Mr Mar-a-Lago after repping some alleged Colombo mafiosos is sitting in the Presidents Conference as the lay leader of a major American Zionist organization… oh, yeah.

@EladNehorai Or that the Presidents Conference is run by an unrepentant former staffer for a Republican group, one of whose lay leaders was tweeting apoplectic about a properly executed search warrant yesterday….
item.source:markdown:
@EladNehorai I mean, it’s not like the guy who repped Mr Mar-a-Lago after repping some alleged Colombo mafiosos is sitting in the Presidents Conference as the lay leader of a major American Zionist organization… oh, yeah.
@EladNehorai Or that the Presidents Conference is run by an unrepentant former staffer for a Republican group, one of whose lay leaders was tweeting apoplectic about a properly executed search warrant yesterday….

item.description: @AvBronstein Wondering if this was a “Christian” “friend”? And how this will play out Christian youth outreach in the years ahead.
item.source:markdown: @AvBronstein Wondering if this was a “Christian” “friend”? And how this will play out Christian youth outreach in the years ahead.

item.description: @AvBronstein And he would defend to his death his right to imprison you for pointing it out.
item.source:markdown: @AvBronstein And he would defend to his death his right to imprison you for pointing it out.

item.description: @BGrueskin I think Rupert Murdoch well knows what he’s paying for.
item.source:markdown: @BGrueskin I think Rupert Murdoch well knows what he’s paying for.

item.description: @ericfingerhut They have been on Team Trump and Team Covid for some time now.
item.source:markdown: @ericfingerhut They have been on Team Trump and Team Covid for some time now.

item.description: @trekonomics For whom?

item.description:
@kevinrsours @AkivaMCohen You’d think I would remember this, having watched several episodes of The Paper Chase back in the day.

@kevinrsours @AkivaMCohen “Twitter: More educational than public television.”
item.source:markdown:
@kevinrsours @AkivaMCohen You’d think I would remember this, having watched several episodes of The Paper Chase back in the day.
@kevinrsours @AkivaMCohen “Twitter: More educational than public television.”

item.description: @AkivaMCohen So if a Canadian sues an Italian for a tort in NY — that goes to NY state court? But if a New Yorker does, that goes to a federal court?
item.source:markdown: @AkivaMCohen So if a Canadian sues an Italian for a tort in NY — that goes to NY state court? But if a New Yorker does, that goes to a federal court?

item.description: In the words of Peggy Noonan, it would be irresponsible not to speculate. https://t.co/SZ62kjtiNr
item.source:markdown: In the words of Peggy Noonan, it would be irresponsible not to speculate. https://t.co/SZ62kjtiNr

item.description: @adam_philips @KurtBusiek As a current Bergen County NJ resident, happy to buy you a meal and give you a bed for the night next time you’re stuck in Lodi. And give you a lift back to Newark.
item.source:markdown: @adam_philips @KurtBusiek As a current Bergen County NJ resident, happy to buy you a meal and give you a bed for the night next time you’re stuck in Lodi. And give you a lift back to Newark.

item.description:
In which the wisdom of out Talmudic sages in relegating prophecy to fools and children is again demonstrated. https://t.co/TR7VcgiG9e

“To this day, as RD recently reported, there are prophets claiming fresh revelations from God about the restoration of Trump to the presidency; calling for the destruction of Washington, DC and monuments deemed to not be “of God” (such as the Statue of Liberty);”
item.source:markdown:

item.description: @emptywheel Do you think it was likely an itemized list of that sort? And if some of the material was of the too-classified-to-describe variety, could the warrant itself be classified?
